short_summary: The Canadian Department of National Defense is looking for a company to provide rental generators for Pointe-à-Carcy.
description: The contract includes, but is not limited to, the supply of labour, material, supervision, and equipment necessary for the rental of two generators for a sixteen (16) months period.
full_summary:
**Rental of Generators**
=========================

**Tender Details**
-----------------

### Solicitation Number

VR000200_82813

### Tender Description

DEFENCE CONSTRUCTION CANADA (DCC) is seeking bids for the rental of two Generators for a sixteen (16) months period. The work includes, but is not necessarily limited to, the supply of labour, materials, supervision, and equipment necessary for the rental of the Generators.

### Scope of Work

* The rental of two Generators for a term of sixteen (16) months
* The supply of labour, materials, supervision, and equipment necessary for the rental of the Generators
* The installation, testing, and commissioning of the Generators
* The maintenance and repair of the Generators during the rental period

### Contract Period

The Work must be completed no later than 480 calendar days after notification of contract award.

### Estimated Cost

The estimated cost for this opportunity is in the range of $870,000.00.

### Terms and Conditions

* The solicitation is being conducted in accordance with the requirements set out in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Chapter Nineteen of the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA).
* Questions regarding this solicitation must be directed only to the point of contact identified in this advertisement.
* Bidders who address their questions to anyone other than the point of contact during the solicitation period may, for that reason alone, be disqualified.

### Contact Information

* Isabelle L'Écuyer, Point of Contact
* Email: [Isabelle.LEcuyer@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Isabelle.LEcuyer@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 418-265-2855

### Request for Tender

Bidders can obtain contract award results from the DCC website at https://www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca/industry/contract-activity.
Bidding and documents are available on http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.  Please note that the preliminary tender results for this project will be available on MERX. 

Note: site visit is not scheduled for this opportunity.
